40 
41 void Arrhenius::setUnits(const XmlElement& node)
42 {
43  assert( node.tag() == "arrhenius_units" );
44  std::string a, e;
45  node.getAttribute("A", a);
46  node.getAttribute("E", e);
47  sm_aunits = Units::split(a);
48  sm_eunits = Units::split(e);
49 }
50 
51 std::vector<Units> _default_aunits() {
52  std::vector<Units> units;
53  units.push_back("mol");
54  units.push_back("m");
55  units.push_back("s");
56  units.push_back("K");
57  return units;
58 }
59 
60 std::vector<Units> _default_eunits() {
61  std::vector<Units> units;
62  units.push_back("J");
63  units.push_back("mol");
64  units.push_back("K");
65  return units;
66 }
67 
68 std::vector<Units> Arrhenius::sm_aunits = std::vector<Units>();
69 std::vector<Units> Arrhenius::sm_eunits = std::vector<Units>();
70 
71 Arrhenius::Arrhenius(const XmlElement& node, const int order)
72 {
73  assert( node.tag() == "arrhenius" );
74 
75  if (sm_aunits.empty())
76  sm_aunits = _default_aunits();
77  if (sm_eunits.empty())
78  sm_eunits = _default_eunits();
79 
80  // Load the temperature exponent (defaults to 0)
81  node.getAttribute("n", m_n, 0.0);
82 
83  // Load the pre-exponential factor (must be given)
84  node.getAttribute("A", m_lnA,
85  "Arrhenius rate law must define coefficient A!");
86  node.parseCheck(m_lnA > 0.0, "Pre-exponential factors must be positive > 0");
87 
88  // Convert to correct units based on the order of the reaction and
89  // store the log value
90  Units A_units =
91  (((sm_aunits[1]^3) / sm_aunits[0])^(order-1)) /
92  (sm_aunits[2] * (sm_aunits[3]^m_n));
93  m_lnA = std::log(A_units.convertToBase(m_lnA));
94 
95  // Load the characteristic temperature
96  if (node.hasAttribute("Ea")) {
97  node.getAttribute("Ea", m_temp);
98  // Convert to J/mol and divide by Ru to get characteristic temp
99  m_temp = (sm_eunits[0]/sm_eunits[1]).convertToBase(m_temp) / RU;
100  } else if (node.hasAttribute("T")) {
101  node.getAttribute("T", m_temp);
102  // Convert to K
103  m_temp = sm_eunits[2].convertToBase(m_temp);
104  } else {
105  node.parseError("Arrhenius rate law must define coefficient Ea or T!");
106  }
107 }
108 
109  } // namespace Kinetics
110 } // namespace Mutation
